DELETE FROM PIST_EMP_QUAL_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PIST_EMP_QUAL_GEN_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

DELETE FROM PIST_EMP_QUAL_PRE_EXP_DTL A WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PIST_EMP_QUAL_DTL A SET A.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PIST_EMP_QUAL_DTL A SET A.NUM_HOSPITAL_ID=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_STATUS=?,A.DT_VALIDATE_DATE=?,A.STR_VALIDATE_BY=?,A.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?, A.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?, A.GDT_EFFECT_DATE=?, A.GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?, A.GNUM_ISVALID=?, A.GNUM_SEAT_ID=? WHERE A.STR_EMP_NO=? AND A.GNUM_SLNO=? AND A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
